title: 1.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
How will the cat move if the following blocks are connected in the programming area and tapped?

a. The cat will move to the left first and then to the right.
b. The cat will not move at all.
c. The cat will move to the right first and then to the left

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
